thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 19 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-India's CCI Reduces Penalty On Eveready, Indo National, Panasonic Energy India

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India's CCI Reduces Penalty On Eveready, Indo National, Panasonic Energy India
text:
April 19 (Reuters) - Competition Commission Of India:
* PASSED FINAL ORDER IMPOSING PENALTY ON THREE LEADING INDIAN ZINC-CARBON DRY CELL BATTERY MANUFACTURERS
* IMPOSED PENALTY ON EVEREADY, INDO NATIONAL, PANASONIC ENERGY INDIA, ASSOCIATION AIDCM FOR COLLUDING TO FIX PRICES OF ZINC-CARBON DRY CELL BATTERY
* REDUCED PENALTY IMPOSED UPON PANASONIC, EVEREADY AND NIPPO BY 100 PERCENT, 30 PERCENT AND 20 PERCENT RESPECTIVELY
* PURSUANT TO REDUCTION, PENALTY IMPOSED ON EVEREADY WAS 1.72 BILLION RUPEES, 422.6 MILLION RUPEES ON INDO NATIONAL AND NO PENALTY WAS IMPOSED ON PANASONIC Source text: bit.ly/2HCJsfe Further company coverage:
